name: GridEditingApi
description: The editing API interface that is available in the grid `apiRef`.

properties.name: getCellMode
properties.description: Gets the mode of a cell.

properties.name: getRowMode
properties.description: Gets the mode of a row.

properties.name: getRowWithUpdatedValues
properties.description: Returns the row with the values that were set by editing the cells. In row editing, field is ignored and all fields are considered.

properties.name: isCellEditable
properties.description: Controls if a cell is editable.

properties.name: setEditCellValue
properties.description: Sets the value of the edit cell. Commonly used inside the edit cell component.

properties.name: startCellEditMode
properties.description: Puts the cell corresponding to the given row id and field into edit mode.

properties.name: startRowEditMode
properties.description: Puts the row corresponding to the given id into edit mode.

properties.name: stopCellEditMode
properties.description: Puts the cell corresponding to the given row id and field into view mode and updates the original row with the new value stored. If params.ignoreModifications is true it will discard the modifications made.

properties.name: stopRowEditMode
properties.description: Puts the row corresponding to the given id and into view mode and updates the original row with the new values stored. If params.ignoreModifications is true it will discard the modifications made.
